description:
medium toned wood with vertical grain; steel butt with steel extending on top surface only with engraved deer; steel trigger housing with engraved dog; engraved dog chasing deer on steel plate on PL side next to trigger; wood carved in foliate designs throughout; ebony rod; engraved on top in gold "Ron Scott". 
Arms and Armor-Firearm
title: Germanic-style "Jaeger" Flintlock Rifle
